sentences.english: Sometimes the six swordsman ritually beheaded the virgin.
sentences.chinese: 有时根据宗教仪式，六个武士将处女的头砍掉。

sentences.english: RELIGIOUS】Religious services are held here every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 每周日都在此举行宗教仪式。

sentences.english: The local phenomena of religious ritual is a very important issue in religious studies.
sentences.chinese: 宗教仪式的本土化现象是宗教学研究的主题。

sentences.english: Langdon is a master of rituals and their mysterious meanings.
sentences.chinese: 兰登精通宗教仪式及蕴含其中的神秘含义。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter describes and analyzes the Religious ceremonies of Baoan'women.
sentences.chinese: 第五章描述并分析了保安族女性的宗教仪式。

sentences.english: Some people also think that it has a processional ritual use.
sentences.chinese: 也有些人认为它为宗教仪式游行所用。

sentences.english: At that time, I saw the Dharma Protecting Deities come to perform this rite.
sentences.chinese: 当时我可以看到护法神来执行这个宗教仪式。

sentences.english: Marigolds are widely used as strings of garland and for Hindu religious rituals. (AP Photo/Bikas Das)
sentences.chinese: 金盏花在印度教的宗教仪式上被广泛用于花环串花。

sentences.english: It was spread because the tribespeople indulged in ritual cannibalism.
sentences.chinese: 该病的传播是由于部族人过度地按宗教仪式嗜食人肉。

sentences.english: Sin turned faith and gospel into legalism and religious rituals.
sentences.chinese: 罪把信仰与救恩化为律法主义与宗教仪式。

sentences.english: I believe that during religious ceremonies, we're at our most vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 我相信，在宗教仪式中，我们处于自己最敏感的状态。

sentences.english: Why do some religions have rituals that are so much more traumatic than others?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有的宗教仪式让人伤痕累累，有的却不这样？

sentences.english: This neglect of religious observances was repugnant to her early traditions .
sentences.chinese: 忽视宗教仪式是违反她童年时期的教养的。

definition: Rites and Ceremonies, part of the Confucian Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4]
the Three Pillars of Faith (Buddha, dharma, sangha)/see also 三寶|三宝[san1 bao3]
church and state/government and education/political education
